pullRequest.title: Add documentation to make it clear that the MetricProducer cannot be shared across exporters
pullRequest.bodyText: It doesn't exactly fix the underlying issue in #1439 (that will probably take a redesign), but it at least documents it more clearly to reduce surprise.

commit.message: Add documentation to make it clear that the MetricProducer cannot be shared across exporters.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -63,6 +63,11 @@ public MeterSdk get(String instrumentationName, String instrumentationVersion) { * Returns the {@link MetricProducer} that can be used to retrieve metrics from this {@code * MeterSdkProvider}. * + *

WARNING: A MetricProducer is stateful. It will only return changes since the last time it + * was access. This means that if more than one {@link + * io.opentelemetry.sdk.metrics.export.MetricExporter} has a handle to this MetricProducer, the + * two exporters will not receive the same metric data to export.
